// frontend/src/components/BastList.js import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function BastList({ bast, searchTerm, currentPage, entriesPerPage, onPageChange, onEntriesChange, onEdit, onDelete, loading, error, }) { const indexOfLast = currentPage * entriesPerPage; const indexOfFirst = indexOfLast - entriesPerPage; const filtered = bast.filter((b) => b.kategori_kode.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || (b.perihal && b.perihal.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())) || (b.tanggal && b.tanggal.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())) ); const current = filtered.slice(indexOfFirst, indexOfLast); const totalPages = Math.ceil(filtered.length / entriesPerPage); return (
{loading ? ( ) : error ? ( ) : current.length === 0 ? ( ) : ( current.map((b, index) => ( )))}
No Bast Kategori Perihal Tanggal Aksi
Memuat...
{error}
Tidak ada data ditemukan
{indexOfFirst + index + 1} {b.kategori_kode} {b.perihal} {b.tanggal}
{/* Pagination */}
{Array.from({ length: totalPages }, (_, i) => ( ))}
); }
